columns.name: VENDOR_ID
columns.desc: Primary key; unique identifier for each supplier (vendor).

columns.name: SEGMENT1
columns.desc: Supplier number; a unique user-defined identifier for the supplier.

columns.name: VENDOR_NAME
columns.desc: Supplier name; full name of the vendor.

columns.name: VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
columns.desc: Supplier type/classification (e.g., EMPLOYEE, EXTERNAL, STATUTORY).

columns.name: INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE
columns.desc: Default currency used for invoices from this supplier.

columns.name: DISTRIBUTION_SET_ID
columns.desc: Identifier for the default distribution set for this supplier.

columns.name: AMOUNT_INCLUDES_TAX_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if amounts include tax (Y/N).

columns.name: EMPLOYEE_ID
columns.desc: If supplier is an employee, links to employee record (FK to PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F).

columns.name: HOLD_ALL_PAYMENTS_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if all payments are held for this supplier (Y/N).

columns.name: HOLD_FUTURE_PAYMENTS_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if future payments are held (Y/N).

columns.name: ONE_TIME_FLAG
columns.desc: Identifies if supplier is a one-time vendor (Y/N).

columns.name: HOLD_UNMATCHED_INVOICES_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag to hold unmatched invoices automatically (Y/N).

columns.name: ALLOW_UNORDERED_RECEIPTS_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if unordered receipts are allowed (Y/N).

columns.name: CREATE_DEBIT_MEMO_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if debit memos can be automatically created (Y/N).

columns.name: ALLOW_AWT_FLAG
columns.desc: Flag to indicate if Allow Withholding Tax is enabled (Y/N).

columns.name: HOLD_FLAG
columns.desc: Indicates if the supplier is on purchasing hold (Y/N).

columns.name: PARTY_ID
columns.desc: Party ID in the Trading Community Architecture (TCA).

columns.name: PAY_GROUP_LOOKUP_CODE
columns.desc: Payment group to which the supplier belongs (e.g., EMPLOYEES, STATUTORY).

columns.name: PAYMENT_PRIORITY
columns.desc: Numeric priority for payments (lower number = higher priority).

columns.name: TERMS_ID
columns.desc: FK to payment terms (AP_TERMS).

columns.name: SET_OF_BOOKS_ID
columns.desc: Set of Books identifier; associates supplier to a ledger.

columns.name: AUTO_TAX_CALC_FLAG
columns.desc: Specifies where tax calculation happens (Supplier/Line/Tax Engine).

columns.name: PAY_DATE_BASIS_LOOKUP_CODE
columns.desc: Basis for payment date calculation (Invoice Date, Goods Received, etc.).

columns.name: PREPAY_CODE_COMBINATION_ID
columns.desc: GL account ID for prepayments.

columns.name: ACCTS_PAY_CODE_COMBINATION_ID
columns.desc: Liability account code combination ID (payables account).

columns.name: AWT_GROUP_ID
columns.desc: Identifier for the withholding tax group.

columns.name: VAT_CODE
columns.desc: VAT code applicable to the supplier.

columns.name: VAT_REGISTRATION_NUM
columns.desc: VAT registration number for tax compliance.

columns.name: VERIFICATION_REQUEST_ID
columns.desc: Identifier for the verification request (HMRC integration).

columns.name: VERIFICATION_NUMBER
columns.desc: Verification number returned by tax authority (e.g., HMRC).

columns.name: WITHHOLDING_STATUS_LOOKUP_CODE
columns.desc: Status of withholding for the supplier (ENABLED, DISABLED, etc.).

notes: AP_SUPPLIERS holds supplier master records across all operating units. Each supplier is uniquely identified by VENDOR_ID. This table is central to invoice and purchase order operations in Oracle AP and Purchasing modules. Supplier data is global (not tied to a specific organization).
